author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IMELDA STARTING TO MOVE NORTH OF THE BAHAMAS... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS TO CONTINUE OVER THE NORTHWEST BAHAMAS FOR A FEW MORE HOURS...
summary: ...IMELDA STARTING TO MOVE NORTH OF THE BAHAMAS... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS TO CONTINUE OVER THE NORTHWEST BAHAMAS FOR A FEW MORE HOURS... As of 2:00 PM EDT Mon Sep 29 the center of Imelda was located near 27.2, -77.3 with movement N at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 988 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IMELDA STARTING TO MOVE NORTH OF THE BAHAMAS... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS TO CONTINUE OVER THE NORTHWEST BAHAMAS FOR A FEW MORE HOURS... As of 2:00 PM EDT Mon Sep 29 the center of Imelda was located near 27.2, -77.3 with movement N at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 988 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Imelda (AT4/AL092025)
